crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'callflow' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var featurecode = (!doc.featurecode) ? false : doc.featurecode; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name, 'type': doc.type, 'numbers': doc.numbers, 'patterns': doc.patterns, 'featurecode': featurecode, 'owner_id': doc.owner_id, 'group_id': doc.group_id}); }
